name: Evolve (itch) (Xd SilentStorm)
description:
##What is the game about?

You start of as a small worm and have to find power ups to grow and unlock new abilities. The game was made in three days for the Mash Up game jam.

##Controls

AD - Left and right

Space - Jump

S - (When unlocked) Down Smash

Left click while moving - (When unlocked) - dash
